pr_title: Add Override Equals method to softButtonObject

timeline.message: Added custom equals and hashcode method to SdlFile
Added custom equals and hashcode method to sdlfile in JavaSE
Added custom equals and hashcode method to SoftbuttonObject
Added custom equals method and hashcode object to softButtonState
Removed test because we removed check from equals method for eventListeners

timeline.bodyHTML:
No need to check primitives for null:

@Override
public int hashCode() {
    int result = 1;
    result += ((getName() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getName().hashCode(), 1));
    result += ((getUri() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getUri().hashCode(), 2));
    result += ((getFileData() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getFileData().hashCode(), 3));
    result += ((getType() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getType().hashCode(), 4));
    result += Integer.rotateLeft(Boolean.valueOf(isStaticIcon()).hashCode(), 5);
    result += Integer.rotateLeft(Boolean.valueOf(isPersistent()).hashCode(), 6);
    result += Integer.rotateLeft(Integer.valueOf(getResourceId()).hashCode(), 7);
    return result;
}
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.bodyHTML:
primitives don't need to be checked for null:

@Override
public int hashCode() {
    int result = 1;
    result += ((getName() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getName().hashCode(), 1));
    result += ((getFilePath() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getFilePath().hashCode(), 2));
    result += ((getFileData() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getFileData().hashCode(), 3));
    result += ((getType() == null) ? 0 : Integer.rotateLeft(getType().hashCode(), 4));
    result += Integer.rotateLeft(Boolean.valueOf(isStaticIcon()).hashCode(), 5);
    result += Integer.rotateLeft(Boolean.valueOf(isPersistent()).hashCode(), 6);
    return result;
}
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.body: Since SdlFile has an `equals()` method now, we can use it in `MenuCell` & `ChoiceCell`'s `hashCode()`.

timeline.message: Removing check primitive vars for null in SdlFile in android project

Fixed naming of test in softButtonManagerTest
Added use of custom Hashcodes created for SdlFile in MenuCell and ChoicCell
